What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Hey. Back with a new bug! Hope this one isn't user error :)
2. Log a druid with the spell Typhoon.
3. Check out my conditions and notifications for the 2 icons. When the first icon hides it should start a timer. When it shows it should stop the timer and reset it to 0. The second icon should show when the timer is >0 AND <2
4. Come out of the TMW options and fire off Typhoon once to get the conditions and notifications rolling.
5. From this point on when the first icon shows it will start the timer and the second icon will appear for 2 seconds. When the first icon hides it will stop and reset the timer. This ofc is backwards.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
